channel.title: Forum account problems
channel.description:
(NOTE: THIS IS A MESSAGE TO ADMINISTRATORS ONLY)
Hi,
Just an hour ago, I've changed my other account's personal information. I've been sent a validation email, but when I logged on to my MSN inbox, there was no mail anywhere. Please private message me to help me with my other forum account. This account that I'm using to write with now is just to confirm about this problem.
Thanks,
Nexon [img]http://i179.photobucket.com/albums/w291/flyffhelp/maplestory.jpg[/img] [size=7pt]http://www.nexon.net/[/size] [size=7pt]http://www.maplestory.com/[/size]

item.title: Forum account problems
item.dc:creator: @dylanzomg dylanzomg
item.description:
@dylanzomg wrote:

I had this problem too but when i tried to loging it worked i didn’t need the e-mail

Read full topic

item.title: Forum account problems
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

Yes, Admins should Respond to your Problem, but there has been a problem with some people about the e-mail that gets sent out. They complain that they dont get it, i think its some sort of error that might be getting fixed, or i might just be wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum account problems
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I suggest you private message an Administrator directly. They seldom come to this part of the forums, so I highly doubt they’ll see this topic.

Read full topic
